Title: 38982 - # Ways to Avoid Phone Fatigue
Direction:
675 Words: List 4-8 ways someone could avoid "phone fatigue". Discuss how and why people can get excited about the release of new smart phones. Discuss the ways phones have been advancing and how their upgraded features could benefit someone who is considering upgrading to to a newer model smart phone.
You can include the target URL when discussing why upgrading to the iPhone 6 could benefit someone.
Your audience is people who own a smart phone, people who are considering buying their first smart phone and people who looking to upgrade to a newer smart phone.
Anchor Text: iphone 6 unrelated keyword (this could be “more information”, “click here”)
